contents:
Add a fun banana to your King Kong pinball machine! Available in two variants: classic Yellow or Luminous glow-in-the-dark that adds extra visual appeal during gameplay.
Product Features üéØ Perfect Fit: Designed specifically for King Kong pinball machines with precise dimensions for easy installation. ‚ú® Two Variants: Choose between classic Yellow or Luminous for enhanced gaming. üçå Quality Resin: Durable resin construction ensures long-lasting performance and vibrant colors that won’t fade.
title: Banana

contents:
This unique, handpainted barrel features a vibrant banana on top, designed specifically for the King Kong pinball table. Crafted with attention to detail, it adds a playful and thematic touch to your game.
Product Features üîß Easy Installation: Simply place on the designated spot on your King Kong table. No tools required. üé® Handpainted Quality: Durable resin construction with vivid colors that enhance your machine’s theme. üçå Thematic Design: Features an iconic banana on top, adding authentic King Kong atmosphere to your game.
title: Barrel with Banana

contents:
Give your pinball some palm trees to add realism and a nice touch. This set includes five palm trees with versatile mounting options, allowing you to create your own custom tropical arrangement. Have a look at the playfield video for some excellent placement ideas.
Product Features üîß Easy Installation: Designed for a simple, hassle-free install. All necessary materials are included. üé® Unique Aesthetic: Each piece offer a custom, high-quality look that enhances your machine’s theme. üå¥ Complete Set: Five palm trees with three different mounting options to achieve the perfect fit for your setup.
title: Set of palm trees

contents:
ü¶ç 3D Printed King Kong Pro Gong Replacement Elevate the look of your King Kong Pro Pinball Machine with this precision-engineered, 3D-printed gong replacement. Designed for a perfect fit and crafted from high-quality, durable materials, this custom gong is the ideal upgrade for enthusiasts seeking optimal performance and aesthetics.
Product Features ‚ö° Perfect Fit: A direct, precision-made replacement for the stock King Kong Pro pinball machine gong. üõ†Ô∏è Optimized Durability: Constructed from premium, resilient 3D-printed materials to ensure long-lasting performance under heavy gameplay. üîß Easy Installation: Designed for a simple, hassle-free swap, getting you back to the action quickly. All necessary materials/hardware are included. üé® Unique Aesthetic: Each piece is individually painted, offering a custom, high-quality look that enhances your machine’s theme. Please note: Minor artistic variations in the painting process may occur, making each gong unique.
title: King Kong Gong Replacement (Pro Model)

contents:
Handcrafted wooden edition - A unique 64x128 pixel dot matrix display (DMD) that combines artisanal craftsmanship with cutting-edge display technology. Each unit features a custom-built wooden housing, carefully handmade to bring warmth and character to your arcade or pinball setup.
Perfect for enthusiasts who appreciate the blend of vintage aesthetics and modern functionality. The wooden body adds a touch of retro charm while maintaining professional-grade display quality with vibrant output and reliable performance.
Built-in Display Functions Easily switch between multiple visual modes using flexible playback controls:
Marquee Mode: Scrolling text display for announcements or machine names. Clock Function: Displays the current time. VU Meter: Visual audio spectrum analyzer that reacts to sound (music or game audio). Game of Life: Runs Conway’s cellular automaton for a retro visual effect. Different Playback Controls: Comprehensive controls for managing display settings and content. Product Features Feature Detail Resolution 64x128 pixel LED display. Housing Handcrafted wooden body - each unit uniquely built with artisanal attention to detail. Aesthetics Vintage charm meets modern technology - warm wooden finish complements retro arcade style. Quality Professional-grade electronic components with custom woodwork. Durability Solid construction designed for long-term use in gameroom environments. Connectivity Web-interface for seamless control and configuration. Integration Full API support for advanced customization and integration into existing systems. Software Future-proof with new features delivered via firmware updates. Value Affordable premium option - get professional quality at a competitive price point.
title: Dot Matrix Display 64x128 - Handmade Wood Edition

contents:
Industrial CNC-machined edition - The ultimate 64x128 pixel dot matrix display (DMD) featuring a precision-manufactured housing created with advanced CNC machining technology. Every unit delivers uncompromising quality with perfectly machined tolerances and a professional finish.
Designed for serious collectors and commercial installations where premium quality and durability matter most. The industrial-grade body ensures exceptional longevity and a flawless appearance that maintains its professional look for years. Perfect for high-end arcade restorations and pinball conversions.
Built-in Display Functions Easily switch between multiple visual modes using flexible playback controls:
Marquee Mode: Scrolling text display for announcements or machine names. Clock Function: Displays the current time. VU Meter: Visual audio spectrum analyzer that reacts to sound (music or game audio). Game of Life: Runs Conway’s cellular automaton for a retro visual effect. Different Playback Controls: Comprehensive controls for managing display settings and content. Product Features Feature Detail Resolution 64x128 pixel LED display. Housing CNC-machined industrial-grade body - precision manufactured with micrometer-level accuracy. Finish Professional flawless finish - perfectly smooth surfaces and precise edges. Quality Premium construction - top-tier electronic components in industrial-grade housing. Durability Built to last - superior materials and manufacturing ensure exceptional longevity. Precision Exact tolerances - perfect fit and alignment for professional installations. Connectivity Web-interface for seamless control and configuration. Integration Full API support for advanced customization and integration into existing systems. Software Future-proof with new features delivered via firmware updates. Grade Commercial quality - ideal for high-end installations and professional environments.
title: Dot Matrix Display 64x128 - Industrial CNC Edition

contents:
Bring the iconic Jack Rabbit Slim’s dance contest scene to life on your pinball machine! This Pulp Fiction topper features Vincent Vega and Mia Wallace on the backside of the glass, creating a stunning stereoscopic depth effect. The sound-reactive LED strip pulses to the music and game sounds, illuminating the artwork with dynamic lighting.
Product Features Iconic scene: Mia and Vincent at the Jack Rabbit Slim’s dance contest Hand-painted artwork on the backside of glass for stereoscopic depth effect Sound-reactive LED strip that responds to game audio Easy installation with dual power options: Connect directly to pinball main board using J109 Use standard USB 5V power adapter Perfect addition to any Pulp Fiction pinball machine Plug-and-play setup
title: Pulp Fiction Topper - Jack Rabbit Slim's Dance

contents:
Personalized flipper keychain with your very own text. Specify up to 10 characters for your very own personalized keychain. Use it for the key on your coin door or as a functional key for daily use.
